description: This file is a BitBake recipe for building and deploying the Xen hypervisor. It includes configuration settings, build instructions, deployment steps, and dependencies related to the Xen hypervisor's build process.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Handles the configuration process for the Xen hypervisor, including merging configuration fragments if present.

methods.name: do_compile
methods.description: Executes the build process for the Xen hypervisor using make.

methods.name: do_install
methods.description: Installs the compiled Xen hypervisor binaries.

methods.name: do_deploy
methods.description: Deploys the Xen binaries and related files to the deployment directory, managing conditional file installations based on their existence.
